name: Polarized Run
description:
Your car is equipped with a new age retro wave vibe polarization machine that lets you change the magnetic pole of your vehicule. Red objects are positively charged and blue ones are negative. If your polarization is opposite to the obstacle, it will attract you, and repulse you otherwise. 

Travel through the procedural generated track, and let the retro new age wave vibe enter your body.

Good luck!

Controls :

z, q, s, d or directionnal arrows to drive the car

Ctrl Left to change polarization

Escape to exit

------------------------ CAUTION : Required configuration --------------------

i80286 with at least 16 MHz

1024 Ko RAM

A VGA screen

Mono speaker

Keyboard with at least the keys "z, q, s, d, ctrl, escape"

200 Mo disk capacity

Stable electrical installation

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Developped with love by the 洗你的手 team:
